name: Global uniques
uniques: [+150]% Strength for cities <vs [AI player] units> <for [City-States] Civilizations>
Cannot build [Settler] units <for [AI player] Civilizations> <when number of [Cities] is more than [3]> <before the [Medieval era]>
Cannot build [Settler] units <for [AI player] Civilizations> <when number of [Cities] is more than [5]> <during the [Renaissance era]>
[-1] Unit Supply per city <for [AI player] Civilizations>
[-1] Unit Supply per [4] population [in all cities] <for [AI player] Civilizations>
Triggers a [Choose Your Ideology] event <upon entering the [Modern era]> <when below [1] [EventCounter001]>
Triggers a [Choose Your Ideology] event <when number of [[Factory] Buildings] is more than [2]> <when below [1] [EventCounter001]> <upon turn end>
